title: London banker lovers nicknamed 'Pops' and 'Popsy' face insider trading charges
text:
An investment banking couple who nicknamed each other "Pops" and "Popsy" have have been charged in the US with selling secret information about deals as part of a “large-scale, international insider-trading ring”.

Benjamin Taylor and Darina Windsor, who both worked for global investment banks with offices in London and Manhattan, are accused by prosecutors of helping generate tens of millions of dollars in illicit profits.

Charges were unsealed on Monday in New York against the pair, who are said to have been in a romantic relationship and shared a London apartment. They called each other “Pops” and “Popsy” in emails, prosecutors said.

The banks were not identified in the indictment, but Moelis...
description: An investment banking couple who nicknamed each other "Pops" and "Popsy" have have been charged in the US with selling secret information about deals as part of a “large-scale, international insider-trading ring”.
